name: Perpetual Nightmare
description:
Imprisoned in a nightmare, you need to find your clothes that have run off before the big meeting at work. Avoid being seen by other people while you hunt down your clothes before you get too embarrassed. Find your pants, shoes, and shirt running around town to escape the nightmare. If the web version lags too much, try downloading the executable. There is an options menu to adjust the mouse sensitivity if needed. 

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Shift - Run
  • Space - Jump
  • M - menu
